headline: Invesco Canada announces cash distributions for its ETFs
summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") announced today the September 2025 distributions for its exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Unitholders of record on September 29, 2025, will receive cash distributions payable on October 7, 2025.
